title: [Vornavian Coast, Caverns]
description: The rush of air blowing from the southeast is frigid.  The crashing of the waves is only a memory, as no sound from the beach can possibly reach this far into the cavern.  Occasional drops of water from the ceiling provide the only sounds.

The rush of air blowing from the southeast is frigid in stark contrast to the warm sun and salty breeze of the nearby beach.  The crashing of the waves is only a memory, as no sound from the beach can possibly reach this far into the cavern.  Occasional drops of water from the ceiling provide the only sounds.
